mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPER_ORGANIZATION ( id, code, fullName, fullAddress, name, type, vcid, alias, chiefId, chiefType, valid, parentId, remark, createDate, lastUpdateDate, address, companyId, districtId, departmentId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{fullName}, #{fullAddress}, #{name}, #{type}, #{vcid}, #{alias}, #{chiefId}, #{chiefType}, #{valid}, #{parentId}, #{remark}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{address}, #{company.id}, #{districtId}, #{department.id} )

INSERT INTO OPER_ORGANIZATION ( id, code, fullName, fullAddress, lastUpdateDate, name, type, vcid, alias, chiefId, chiefType, valid, createDate, parentId, remark, address, companyId, districtId, departmentId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{fullName}, #{fullAddress}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{name}, #{type}, #{vcid}, #{alias}, #{chiefId}, #{chiefType}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{parentId}, #{remark}, #{address}, #{company.id}, #{districtId}, #{department.id} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE OPER_ORGANIZATION
fullName = #{fullName,javaType=java.lang.String},
fullAddress = #{fullAddress,javaType=java.lang.String},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
type = #{type,javaType=com.tx.local.operator.model.OrganizationTypeEnum},
vcid = #{vcid,javaType=java.lang.String},
alias = #{alias,javaType=java.lang.String},
chiefId = #{chiefId,javaType=java.lang.String},
chiefType = #{chiefType,javaType=com.tx.local.operator.model.ChiefTypeEnum},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
parentId = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
address = #{address,javaType=java.lang.String},
districtId = #{districtId,javaType=java.lang.String},
companyId = #{company.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
departmentId = #{department.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
AND code = #{code}
